result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُواْ ٱبۡتِغَآءَ وَجۡهِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ وَيَدۡرَءُونَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ عُقۡبَى ٱلدَّارِ
result.translation: 22. usun gibdaabinaa kee Yallih taaqatal yisbire mara , sinni Rabbih fooca edde gurrusak, salat elle faxxiima innal abah soolisaah keenih necee rizqhik tu yacee mara kinni qellisak ayballuk, meqe taamat uma taama gutqa mara tet dugtankch, too mari usun akeeral ellecabô dabqay fayla le Ion.
